metadata.synopsis: This AD plays during the Ketheric Showdown in the lower Colony, after Nightsong is freed from her soul cage. She will transform into her paladin form.
metadata.how_to_trigger: This AD plays during the Ketheric Showdown in the lower Colony. It will play on Nightsong.- Load SCL_Main_A- Using ReCon command "oe KethericShowdown_Start"  to teleport yourself there.- Use "oe KethericShowdown_FreeNightsong". Nightsong will be freed.- Once Nightsong gets her first turn in combat (and she is available to speak), this AD will play on her as she transform into her paladin form.

0.speaker: Nightsong
0.text: MOONMAIDEN, HEAR ME! DAME AYLIN IS FREE!
0.context: NodeContext: Scorn in the heat of battle - her nemesis has just turned into a hideous monster
